divs: sighting detailson 8\14\13 at around 9pm i was taking garbage out at work. i looked up at the sky and saw a bright rose\pink light very slowly moving northwest above cloud level. it slowly dimmed as it was moving. at first i thought it was a satellite but after it dimmed completely out, i could make out a dark colored craft. the craft had no lights it was about the size of a grain of rice held at arms length but shaped more like a triangle. it slowly disappeared in the distance above the clouds.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Grinnell
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: Pink/rose bright light. slowly dimmed then saw craft with no lights
